reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Development and design of Digital Access ODA programme

description.narrative: The Digital Access Programme will work across three UK departments; DFID, FCO and DCMS in targeted ODA eligible countries. The programme will look to address issues of connectivity, cyber security, digital skills and inclusion, the regulatory and policy environment, and digital ecosystems. The FCO component will work to help counter act cybercrime and cyber security threats which act as a brake on development and prosperity gains. It will aim to promote greater inclusion of the world's poorest people in the digital economy, reducing poverty and increasing economic prosperity opportunites for UK businesses . [Following a methodology change, from financial year 19/20 costs under this activity will be reported against a new activity line. You can find the new IATI identifier by looking up “other identifier information”.]
